data.name: CBS_Desolation Demo
data.detailed_description:
Build, defend your sanctum, gather resources and survive in this post apocalyptic simulated survival.

Demo Features:

  • Build your sanctum from scratch, start with little water and other resources
  • Gather resources, run scouting and otherwise expeditions to nearing zones
  • Play through part of a complete story featuring main lines of the full game.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Survive, build and outlive within your sanctuary!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
